https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/79BuBcYfnrPLd1XTQtrdobFN04O.jpg A cheating girlfriend (Woman in the Car) runs away with the money stolen by his boyfriend and unknowingly leaves a highly confidential information contained CD behind to him. When her boyfriend (Man) sees the contents of the CD, he turns to his journalist ex-girlfriend (Woman) to report on it. But they are unaware of the danger about to ensue. Before the Dawn
